Row.Text: One of the first gunpowder units of the game. Only the Ottomans may build it. This Unit is cheaper to train, stronger on offense and heals when it kills an enemy, unlike the Musketman which it replaces.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]One of the first gunpowder units of the game. Only the Ottomans may build it. This Unit is cheaper to train, stronger on offense and heals when it kills an enemy, unlike the Musketman which it replaces.
